fields.name: Acknowledgement_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Within fourteen (14) business days of receipt of your request, you will receive acknowledgement from the Department of Human Resources indicating whether or not your request has been approved for reimbursement. Further instructions will also be enclosed that must be adhered to upon completion of each course.
  • Signature at the department level does not indicate your request for reimbursement has been granted and/or approved.
  • Submitting this Tuition Reimbursement request also does not indicate approval.
  • Department of Human Resources provides final approval for all requests.

    • Upon completion of each course the following items must be submitted within forty-five (45) business days for reimbursement:
  • Original paid receipts
  • Original grade transcripts
  • Original canceled check and/or original credit card statement
  • An original itemized statement from the school
  • Copies of the last three (3) pay stubs for the time period of three (3) pay periods prior to the end of the semester/class.

    • Please note:
  • A credit card statement must be in your or your spouse's name with full name shown.
  • Applications will not be accepted if all requested items are not submitted.
  • If your application is returned to you, you will only be allowed to resubmit it if you are still within your forty-five (45) business day completion period.

fields.name: Acknowledgement_Response
fields.fieldText: Please acknowledge:

fields.name: AcknowledgementCaseRejectedDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Sorry, you must accept the terms in order to be eligible for Tuition Reimbursement.

fields.name: DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Sorry, you are not eligible for Tuition Reimbursement. Applications must be submitted in person to the Department of Human Resources fourteen (14) working days before the semester class/begins for final approval.

fields.name: Benefits_Multi_Select
fields.fieldText: If you will receive benefits and/ or assistance from any other sources (loans, grants, etc.), please indicate the source. (Select all that apply)

fields.name: InHouseRegistry
fields.fieldText: Sorry, In-House Registry Nurses are not eligible for Tuition Reimbursement.

fields.name: CaseRejectedDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Sorry, you are not eligible for Tuition Reimbursement if you are currently on/ will be going on LOA/FMLA or are currently receiving Workers' Compensation/Disability.

fields.name: CaseRejectedClass
fields.fieldText: Sorry, only classes are eligible for Tuition Reimbursement.

fields.name: YouMustBeFullTime
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, you must be full time at Cook County Health for at least 1 year in order to be eligible for Tuition Reimbursement.
Days since hire date: {!DaysSinceHireDate}

fields.name: Is_this_a_class_certification_or_seminar
fields.fieldText: Is this a class, certification or seminar?

fields.name: CourseInformationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Completed applications must be submitted fourteen (14) business (not including holidays or weekends) days before the semester/class begins for final approval. Applications submitted any time after the fourteen (14) day cut off and/or after the semester/class starts will not be considered. Incomplete, unsigned and/or applications missing the required attached documents will not be accepted.

fields.name: CourseInfoDisplayText2
fields.fieldText: An official course curriculum for the entire semester, and a course schedule which indicates the start and end date of each class, must be attached to the reimbursement form at the time of submission. All classes must be listed on the course outline in order to receive reimbursement.

fields.name: CourseInfoDisplayText3
fields.fieldText: Only three (3) courses per semester, trimester or quarter will be considered for reimbursement. Please submit one tuition reimbursement request for up to 3 courses.

fields.name: CourseInfoDisplayText4
fields.fieldText:
Reimbursement covers: Tuition, required textbooks, materials and fees such as application, registration, laboratory, and mandatory fees.
This process is entirely paperless. Upon submission, you will receive a confirmation to your Cook County email account.

fields.name: CompletionText
fields.fieldText:
Your Tuition Reimbursement has been submitted for review. You will receive a confirmation to your Cook County email account.
You can log in to HR ServiceLink to review the status of your case.

screens.name: Have_you_been_full_time_at_least_1_year
screens.label: Have you been full time at least 1 year?

fields.name: InformationText
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your interest in participating in the Cook County Health Tuition Reimbursement program! Please note that all applications must be completed in their entirety, reviewed and signed by the Department Manager / Executive Leader for course content only, prior to submitting to the Department of Human Resources for final approval.
At the time that you submit your request for reimbursement you must have completed one (1) full year of service at your facility, be actively on the payroll (before, during and at the completion of the semester/class), and employed as a Nurse whose job title is covered under the Collective Bargaining Agreement. In-house registry nurses are not eligible for tuition reimbursement. The tuition reimbursement program is for employees pursuing nursing or nursing-related degrees only.
Cook County Health will reimburse at the rate of 100% for those individuals consistently working 80 hours per pay period during the time the course(s) were taken. Individuals working less than 80 hours per pay period will receive reimbursement on a pro rata basis.

fields.name: Agreement
fields.fieldText: This agreement is made between the County of Cook (the "County") and the Employee:

fields.name: Employee_Agreement
fields.fieldText:
In accordance with the terms and conditions of the County's Tuition Reimbursement Program, in the event an employee ceases employment with the County for any reason other than layoff, including termination for cause, less than two years after completion of an educational course for which the employee receives reimbursement, the Employee agrees to repay the tuition reimbursement based on a pro-rata portion of the remaining time in the two year period.

If employment ceases and repayment amount is owed by the employee, and the employee does not otherwise repay the amount, the Employee agrees to have the repayment amount deducted from the Employee's paycheck(s) that are issued after employment ceases. This includes any and all compensation that is due. After such deduction, any remaining balance owed to the County shall continue to be an obligation of the Employee to the County. The Employee agrees to repay any remaining balance owed after the deduction from the final paycheck to County within 90 days of the date of termination, or if the termination is timely grieved, upon final resolution of the grievance upholding the termination.

If, for any reason, any amount due from the Employee under this Agreement is not fully satisfied in accordance with the above paragraph, the County shall be entitled to collect the entire amount due from the Employee and to take any necessary legal action to do so. In the event that that County must resort to legal action and/or retain the services of any attorney or collection agent in connection with any amounts owed under this Agreement, the County shall be entitled to recover from the Employee, in addition to the amount due under this agreement, all reasonable attorney's fees, collection fees and costs and court costs.

fields.name: NNOCText
fields.fieldText: The Employee's signature below indicates that the Employee has fully read this agreement and agrees to its terms and is entering into this Agreement knowingly and voluntarily.

fields.name: NNOC_Agreement
fields.fieldText: Participation Agreement

fields.name: InfoText
fields.fieldText:
All applications must be completed, reviewed and signed by the Department Manager / Executive Leader for course content only, prior to filing. Please have your Supervisors approval email ready for upload to complete Part 1.


Requirements:
  • Full year of service at your facility
  • Be actively on the payroll (before, during and at the completion of the semester/class)
  • Employed as a Nurse whose job title is covered under the Collective Bargaining Agreement


Note: In-house registry nurses are not eligible for tuition reimbursement. The tuition reimbursement program is for employees pursuing nursing or nursing-related degrees.


Reimbursement at the rate of 100% for those individuals consistently working 80 hours per pay period during the time the course(s) were taken. Individuals working less than 80 hours per pay period will receive reimbursement on a pro rata basis.

fields.name: UploadMsg
ActivationOfUser
fields.fieldText:
The selected user is not active.

If you are not in HR, please contact your administrator.

If you are in HR, to activate an employee, please follow the instructions below:
  • Exit the current workflow and click on the cog wheel located on the top right part of the Salesforce screen
  • After clicking, please select Setup which will take you to a separate page
  • Enter the name of the employee that is inactive in the search bar located on the top of your Salesforce screen
  • Once on a users page, click on the Edit button located at the top, middle of the screen
  • Next, click inside of the checkbox next to where it says "Active"
  • Finally, navigate back to the homepage by clicking on the 9 dots that are located on the top left part of the screen under the blue cloud icon

fields.name: WelcomeField
fields.fieldText: The system is designed to guide you through the steps to file your request. Click the Next button to continue.

subflows.name: SearchorFileOnBehalfofSelf

textTemplates.name: AllVariableValues

textTemplates.description: Body text for email sent if HR is filing on behalf of someone
textTemplates.name: AutomaticEmailToEmployee
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!ContactRecord.FirstName} {!ContactRecord.LastName},
Your case regarding Tuition Reimbursement has been submitted to Cook County Health Department of Human Resources for review.
Human Resources will send you an email within three weeks to confirm approval of your request or note if anything is missing from your Tuition Reimbursement submission.
You can access your case by clicking here:
https://hrservicelink.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Case/{!CaseID}/view
Thank you,
Department of Human Resources

textTemplates.name: CaseCreatedEmail
textTemplates.text:
{!CaseRecord.ContactName__c},
Your {!CaseRecord.RecordTypeName__c} case has been submitted to Cook County Health Department of Human Resources for review.
Human Resources will send you an email within three weeks to confirm approval of your request or note if anything is missing from your Tuition Reimbursement submission.
You can access the {!CaseRecord.RecordTypeName__c} case by clicking here:
https://hrservicelink.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Case/{!CaseID}/view
Thank you,
Department of Human Resources

textTemplates.name: TuitionReimbursmentBodyText
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!CurrentUserRecord.FirstName} {!CurrentUserRecord.LastName},
Your case regarding Tuition Reimbursement has been submitted to Cook County Health Department of Human Resources for review.
Human Resources will send you an email within three weeks to confirm approval of your request or note if anything is missing from your Tuition Reimbursement submission.
You can access your case by clicking here:
https://hrservicelink.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Case/{!CaseID}/view
Thank you,
Department of Human Resources
